code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl='/api/products';var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(productObject){return axios.post(baseUrl,productObject).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(productObject){return axios.put(baseUrl+'/'+productObject.id,productObject).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update};
